title: 今晚服务器突然崩溃
author: 闲日炎炎
txt_content:
之前还好好的今晚突然一直崩溃。。。付崩溃日志
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// But it works on my machine.
Time: 17-4-30 下午11:21
Description: Ticking entity
java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking entity

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 还会不会崩溃，如果崩溃把全部mod删除一下再加回来
